{"id":488750143,"lang":"python3","time":"2 months, 1 week","timestamp":1620134987,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"200 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/488750143/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Non-decreasing Array","memory":"15.2 MB","code":"from typing import List\nclass Solution:\n    def checkPossibility(self, nums: List[int]) -> bool:\n        if len(nums) <= 2:\n            return True\n        tmp1, tmp2 = nums[:], nums[:]\n        for i in range(len(nums) - 1):\n            if nums[i] > nums[i+1]:\n                tmp1[i] = nums[i+1]\n                tmp2[i+1] = nums[i]\n                break\n        return (sorted(tmp1) == tmp1) or (sorted(tmp2) == tmp2)","compare_result":"","title_slug":"non-decreasing-array"}
